d:
Chiropterophily is an 18+ NSFW short comic about our characters in a cheeky fantasy AU.  It features a fairy, Bastian, and their dangerous encounter with the strange bat-like creature, Paolo... as well as his taste for them.

24 hi-res pages, containing a big spider, bondage, size-difference, teratophilia, oral/tongue-fucking, weird fairy genitalia, and penetrative sex. Enjoy!

Please support the artist 
https://carnemancy.itch.io/

https://bsky.app/profile/carnemancy.bsky.social
